org.apache.juneau.assertions

Class ThrowableAssertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion
      • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentAssertion<R>
        • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentThrowableAssertion<ThrowableAssertion>
          • org.apache.juneau.assertions.ThrowableAssertion

  • public class ThrowableAssertion
extends FluentThrowableAssertion<ThrowableAssertion>
    Used for assertion calls against throwable objects.
    Example:

    // Validates the throwable message or one of the parent messages contain 'Foobar'. assertThrowable(throwable).contains("Foobar");

        public ThrowableAssertion msg(String msg,
                              Object... args)
        Description copied from class: Assertion
        Allows to to specify the assertion failure message.

        String can contain "{msg}" to represent the original message.
